Write a summary of the book that is 100-200 words in length and includes at least two different perspectives on this product. Here's how you could write it:
This cookbook offers readers an easy-to-follow guide to creating delicious, healthy meals using all sorts of ingredients from around world without having any cooking experience or special equipment needed for most recipes.
While some reviewers praise its simple yet flavorful dishes as "easy" (1), others have found them too bland ("too basic") with one reviewer stating they were more like soups than full-fledged meal options due their lackluster presentation.

Here are three possible ways your review might go:

* This BOSH! series has won over me - I was skeptical about these new plant-based foods but ended up loving my first dish!
**A great resource if looking just starting out**
I'm not sure what kind of food we're going after here...but overall recipe looks good
Overall: A fun read perfect when trying something completely foreign

* "The BOSH! series is a [TYPE] of cookbook that offers simple, healthy recipes with all the ingredients you need to make delicious meals. The book's focus on using fresh and seasonal foods makes it an excellent choice for anyone looking healthier."
"Overall I was impressed by how easy this recipe turned out - even my kids loved helping me cook up some tasty dishes!"

Here are two examples:
"The BOSH!: Simple Recipes * Amazing Food All Plants series is a [TYPE]. Customers praise its delicious and easy-to-make recipes, but some complain about the lack of variety in their ingredient list."

Example:
"The product is a [BOSH] series. Customers praise its simple recipes and all-plant-based ingredients, but some complain about the lack of flavor in one particular dish."

Example:
"The product is a [BOSH] series. Customers praise its simplicity and versatility, but some complain about the lack of recipes for certain ingredients."

Example:
